/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The sky overhead is a blanket of overcast clouds, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The colors in the image are muted, adding to the overall tranquility of the scene.
